SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.services

Klasse OrganizationService

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.services.OrganizationService
@Service public class OrganizationService extends Object
This Service provides usage and logic for the Organization repository and the OrganizationAccount repository. It provides methods for manipulating the data of these repositories.

  • Methodendetails

    • getOrganizations

      public List<Organization> getOrganizations()
      Returns a list of all organizations.
      Gibt zurück:
      List list of all organizations

    • getOrganizationById

      public Organization getOrganizationById(String organizationId)
      Returns the organization specified by its id.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization
      Gibt zurück:
      Organization with the given id
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if for the given id there's no organization.

    • getAccounts

      public List<FleventsAccount> getAccounts(Organization organization)
      Returns all accounts of the given organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization to get the accounts from
      Gibt zurück:
      List list of all accounts

    • createOrganisation

      public Organization createOrganisation(Organization organisation)
      Creates the given organization in the database.
      Parameter:
      organisation - the organization to be created
      Gibt zurück:
      the created organization object

    • editOrganisation

      public Organization editOrganisation(String organizationId, Organization organisation)
      Overwrites the specified organization with the given organization object.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to be overwritten
      organisation - the new organization object
      Gibt zurück:
      the overwritten organization

    • removeAccount

      public void removeAccount(Organization organization, FleventsAccount account)
      Removes the given account from the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization with the account to be removed
      account - the account to be removed

    • changeRole

      public void changeRole(Organization organization, FleventsAccount account, OrganizationRole fromRole, OrganizationRole toRole)
      Changes the role of the given account in the specified organization to the new given role. Throws an Exception if the given account is not in the organization or if the given account already has the role to change to.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization with the account
      account - the account which role has to be changed
      fromRole - the previous role of the account
      toRole - the new role of the account

    • getManagedOrganization

      public List<Organization> getManagedOrganization(FleventsAccount account)
      Returns all organizations where the given account has the role "admin".
      Parameter:
      account - the account to get the managed organizations from
      Gibt zurück:
      list of all managed organizations

    • addAccountToOrganization

      public void addAccountToOrganization(Organization organization, FleventsAccount account, OrganizationRole role)
      Adds the given account to the specified organization with the specified role. Throws an exception if the account is already part of the organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization to add the account to
      account - the account to be added
      role - the role for the account in the organization

    • deleteOrganization

      public void deleteOrganization(Organization organization)
      Deletes the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization object to be deleted

    • leaveOrganization

      public void leaveOrganization(Organization organization, FleventsAccount account)
      Leaves a specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organzation to leave
      account - the account who leaves the organization

    • setMailConfigOrgaInvite

      public void setMailConfigOrgaInvite(Organization organization, String mailText)
      Sets the Email-Configuration for the organization invitation in the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization to set the Email-Configuration
      mailText - the text for the MailConfiguration to set

    • setMailConfigEventInvite

      public void setMailConfigEventInvite(Organization organization, String mailText)
      Sets the Email-Configuration for the event invitation in the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization to set the Email-Configuration
      mailText - the text for the MailConfiguration to set

    • setMailConfigEventInfo

      public void setMailConfigEventInfo(Organization organization, String mailText, LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Sets the Email-Configuration for the event info in the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization to set the Email-Configuration
      mailText - the text for the MailConfiguration to set
      localDateTime - the time to set

    • setMailConfigEventFeedback

      public void setMailConfigEventFeedback(Organization organization, String mailText, LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Sets the Email-Configuration for the event feedback in the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization to set the Email-Configuration
      mailText - the text for the MailConfiguration to set
      localDateTime - the time to set

    • getMailConfig

      public MailConfig getMailConfig(Organization organization)
      Gets the Email-Configuration for the specified organization.
      Parameter:

      Gibt zurück:
      the mail configuration

    • setMailConfig

      public void setMailConfig(Organization organization, MailConfig mailConfig)
      Sets the Email-Configuration for the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization to get the Email-Configuration
      mailConfig - the mail configuration of the organization
